opinion.opinion_text:
The instant case is identical on its facts and is controlled by Jones v. Balkcom, ante.
Judgment affirmed. All the Justicesconcur.
ARGUED MAY 10, 1954 â€” DECIDED MAY 31, 1954.
opinion.posture: Habeas corpus. Before Judge Cowart. Reidsville City Court. February 25, 1954.
opinion.attorneys:
A. T. Walden, E. S. D'Antignac, for plaintiff in error.
J. T. Grice, Deputy Assistant Attorney-General, John J.Flynt, Jr., Solicitor-General, contra.
